website_summaries.verdict: A four-piece toenail correction kit that includes virtually all of the tools you need.
pros: The included clipper is extra-large for toenails of a variety of sizes
Toenail correction device is curved to give you the best results by changing the angle of the toenail growth
The all-silver construction of each tool makes them easy to clean and maintain for long periods of time
cons: Lacks instructions to get the best results right from the start

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I bought mainly for the toenail correcter. I don't have ingrown nails, but my nails are starting to curl in so I'm just preventing them. I bought this set mainly for the corrector and the other tools are just an added bonus. At first, it was a little awkward placing the corrector, but it stayed put once placed. I soaked my foot with it on and just tightened every few minutes. There was absolutely no pain!
customer_reviews.author: Charity Sheehy

customer_reviews.title: Well made toenail kit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use toenail kit. I have 1 toe that the nail grows down under the skin and attaches to it and wanted to see if this would help solve my issue because when it comes to clipping it it is extremely painful and usually ends up with my toe bleeding and very sore for a few days, but I have no choice but to cut it. Since using this I've been able to get the toenail up from the skin and no longer have issues cutting it. Painting them is a lot easier too. It's a nice kit, well made and seem to be pretty sturdy. Not having to deal with that pain anymore is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Esprit

customer_reviews.title: CLIPPER CUTTING HEAD MISS ALIGNED, DOESN'T CUT!
customer_reviews.text: The main clipper cutting jaws do not line up. when clippers are closed, one jaw is just a hair below its mating jaw so cutting edges do not aline and do not cut. I don't know if I just got a bad pair, but they are useless to me so I will be returning. Never got to try other items in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Beastdrvr

customer_reviews.title: My turn!  Thank Goodness!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of tools earlier in the year for my ingrown toe nail problem! Well I never got to use it! My son visited from California right at the same time, out that adorable smile on and took it home! He said it works well! My turn! This has all the necessary tools to get the job done! Being a nurse, these are the same tools the doctor uses! I just prefer to handle my long term problem myself! It much cheaper, and the tools work very well!
customer_reviews.author: Hope❤️

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Man that little ingrown puller upper hurt...but it made it so easy to get that little sucker out...its like a torture device for your ingrown.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy set
customer_reviews.text: The packaging for this product was nice. The tools seem very sturdy. The clippers do a great job at trimming the nail. The nail lifter is extremely useful; I have always struggled with being able to pry the nail out of the nail bed. The lifter makes it simple.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nail straightener is no good. All the other pieces are great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the nail straightener. But it’s flimsy and is hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Niall

customer_reviews.title: Good for toenail
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly, but since it is cheap I thought it would not be good quality, but I am impressed with the quality and how sharp it is, I had a revlon brand before and this is way sharper. I’ll see how it stays sharp and will update here on how long it lasts, but so far great purchase. I have fungus and thick toenails and this worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Colette Gottesman-Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Good bye ingrown nails!
customer_reviews.text: all of these tools worked great to release pain do to ingrown toe nails. I was able to do it myself with no help from my husband or a visit to the doctor!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rugg

customer_reviews.title: This product is a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a lifesaver. Much cheaper than pedicures or a trip to the podiatrist. The nail file alone is such great quality, it's worth the buy just for it!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: My son has ingrown toenails bought this for him and he swears by it!
customer_reviews.author: Raesin17

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great set for traveling and for home you have everything you need
customer_reviews.author: SAINTZ343

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write bad reviews but the clippers and the trimmers literally came apart when I tried to use them the first time. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A.M. Bellomo

customer_reviews.title: Rejected Bin parts
customer_reviews.text: Looked ok at first. Inspect the “hooked fingers.” One side looked fine the other looked as if it was pulled from a reject bin. Perhaps it should have hit the reject bin?
customer_reviews.author: James A

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the hubby, ( mister no doctor for me I'm a man). He's all better now
customer_reviews.text: Aaaahhhh, the relief I have, after I have successfully eliminated that pesky ingrown toenail. Beats the heck out of the doctor's bill.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, it's cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The product is very very cheaply made, on of the items broke the first time I used it
customer_reviews.author: dana lee

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: They are super sharp which is what i needed so they cut very easily and smooth!!Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Crisp

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the toenail corrector and it broke immediately.... very disappointed!!:(
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my boyfriend. He has ingrown toenails for a long time. He has been struggling to do manicure. Since I got the kit, everything turns out to be easy. The tools are sturdy, and I could be able to help him cut the nails. He's very happy!
customer_reviews.author: An Khieu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This set is super helpful with my ingrown nails. It works amazing! I have consistent trouble with my big toenails and all these tools help. The trimmers do a great cutting job on my nails.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: A good kit for ingrown toenails
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. The cuticle trimmers are small and get into those tiny spaces . The toenail gadget hasn't been used . Overall, a good kit .
customer_reviews.author: Clm

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tools
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and nice size tools. I'm not sure how to use the little clamp toe gadgets but everything else is good. Packages nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: Demo Lady

customer_reviews.title: Love it, a must have
customer_reviews.text: Used on mom in laws ingrown toenails, worked great n no pain!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M Hberg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy pieces but the ingrown nail device is a challenge to use. I only use clippers, file, and cuticle stick.
customer_reviews.author: Elza V

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for trimming my toe nails
customer_reviews.text: Cut my tough nail just fine however I cut my cuticle when using one of the tools. I will be more careful next time.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hallworth

customer_reviews.title: Super dull
customer_reviews.text: The hand cutters are super dull. The whole reason for buying product. The main selling point of product did not work for me. The actual nail clippers are sharper. But I have those. The nail file was better than most metel files. But not as good as the synthetic kind. I like the accesories, but they are nothing extrodinary. I do use the file. Have not gotten a chance to use the ingrown nail contraption. Will update when I do.
customer_reviews.author: amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great little kit
customer_reviews.text: My husband has really bad ingrown toenails and I don't know why I never thought to get one of these kits. This one is perfect doesn't have all the tools you really don't use and is really easy to use. I wont upload a picture because no one wants to see it in action. I am extremely happy with it though. Very sturdy does not look cheap like other ones I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: JC_Rose

product_meta.title: Ingrown Toenail Clipper Removal Correction Clip Nail Clippers Set,Stainless Steel Ingrown Toe Nail Correction Tool Nail File Clipper Surper Sharp Blades Toenail Trimmer Nipper (sliver)
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL PEDICURE SET: Toenail Corrector and Clean Tool adopts lever mechanics to change the angle of nail growth, provide a great care for your nails to keep you healthy. (For patients who have severe ingrown toenails, professional treatment is recommended,don't correct it by yourself.)

PREMIUM MATERIAL: Our professional pedicure set is made of surgical grade stainless steel with polishing finished. It comes with delicate design, which is rust-proof, corrosion-resistant and easy to sanitize !
NAIL LIFTER: Double sized nail lifter help cleans dirt that under toenail, lifts toenail, keep nails neatly and prevent future ingrown and nail groove pain.
NAIL CLIPPER&FILE: Powerful and sharp clippers cleanly and smoothly cuts ingrown toenails or thick nail. File nails with a smooth touch after treatment.
INGROWN TOENAIL CORRECTOR: Toenail Corrector adopts lever mechanics to change the angle of nail growth. Then the nail will become flattened and widened and not grow inside toenail.
